thread.title: Victoria Beckham fails to raise a smile as she swaps up her outfit for another eye-catching ensemble in New York
thread.title_full: Victoria Beckham fails to raise a smile as she swaps up her outfit for another eye-catching ensemble in New York

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Victoria Beckham fails to raise a smile as she swaps up her outfit for another eye-catching ensemble in New York
text:
Victoria Beckham returns to work in New York (Photo: Splash News)   
She might have been dressed brightly, but the colour of her clothes certainly didn't appear to reflect Victoria Beckham's mood. 
The Spice Girl turned high end fashion designer, 42, was pictured in New York on Monday attending a series of business meetings, and made sure she turned heads in a number of eye-catching outfits. 
Kicking off her day, the mum-of-four - who wasn't accompanied by husband David who was seen in London - opted to wear a bright red ribbed jumper over a bold light blue shirt and matching long skirt. 
Victoria, who kept her eyes hidden behind a huge pair of sunglasses, failed to raise even a hint of a smile as she walked into a building. (Photo: Splash News) (Photo: Splash News) 
And just hours later, she had swapped up her look, this time opting for a loose-fitting bright orange dress with black button details around the collar and waist. 
She was wearing the same style of shoes, but had swapped the brown for bright blue. (Photo: Splash News) (Photo: Splash News) 
Meanwhile, it's been reported David Beckham ’s team have drafted in a crack squad of former spooks to track down the criminals who hacked and stole the cache of emails which have rocked the sporting world. 
His advisors have employed the services of cyber-security firm Marclay Associates to unmask the mastermind behind the theft of more than 18.6 million emails. Victoria Beckham (Photo: Splash News) Victoria Beckham (Photo: Splash News) 
Becks’ PR chief Simon Oliveira has also spoken to the UK police with a view to them working alongside the ongoing Portugese investigation into the hack. 
A source said: “Contact has been made with cops in this country, too. There is a very good case for a UK investigation as it affects British citizens.” 
It comes as Whitehall honours chiefs blamed David ’s personal tax affairs for the decision not to give him a knighthood. 
Sources inside the secretive Whitehall committee which makes recommendations on honours decisions told the Mirror Beckham had been given a ‘red flag’ by HM Revenue and Customs for his tax affairs in 2013. Red hot Victoria Beckham (Photo: Splash News) Victoria Beckham looking radiant in red as she leaves a business meeting in NYC (Photo: Splash News) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
